• Experience
  • About
  • Contact

  • Free Advice

    Feature the flaw.

    The best strategy to deal with a weakness or vulnerability is often to move it front and center.

  • Free Advice

    Don’t just do something. Sit there!

    Don’t let resources or expectations define your strategy. When the situation calls for it, sit and enjoy some tea. Patience is a virtue most clients have forgotten and most firms can’t afford to offer.

  • Free Advice

    Your message doesn’t matter.

    Even an ass knows empty words from something real. No one hears what you say. People listen to what you do, and effective enduring messages flow from honest actions and deeds.

  • Free Advice

    Why win, if you can lose.

    Success comes in lots of shapes and sizes. A well planned, well executed “loss” can often times be better than a “win.” Make sure successful solutions exist all around.

  • Free Advice

    Don’t change opinion. Change how people think.

    It is not enough to just change someone’s mind. Instead, radically alter the landscape and allow people to see you and your issues in a new light.

  • Feature the flaw.

  • Don’t just do something. Sit there!

  • Your message doesn’t matter.

  • Why win, if you can lose.

  • Don’t change opinion. Change how people think.
